name: GrandMother (itch)
description:
A game for GGJ2021 Australia. Theme "Lost and Found"

A story about their loved ones. 

Local 2-player game, player 1 on the left controls "Found"

player 2 on the right controls "Lost"

Player 1 controls:

WASD - movement

E - pickup/drop item

R - Catch dog

Player 2 controls:

Up,Down,Left,Right Arrow keys - movement

Comma - Sprint

Period - Bark

Slash - pickup/drop item

Art: Max Phoenix

Composer: Toby Mach

Program/Design: Gordon Guo
